#Generated by VisualGDB project wizard.
#Note: VisualGDB will automatically update this file when you add new sources to the project.

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.7)
project(Gui)
set(LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES "")

set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 14)

set(CMAKE_INCLUDE_CURRENT_DIR ON)
set(CMAKE_AUTOMOC ON)
set(CMAKE_AUTOUIC ON)
set(CMAKE_AUTORCC ON)
find_package(Qt5 COMPONENTS Core Widgets REQUIRED)

file(GLOB GUI_SOURCES . *.cpp *.h *.ui)

include_directories(common/resources)
add_subdirectory(common/resources)

include_directories(common/widgets)
add_subdirectory(common/widgets)

include_directories(common/data)
add_subdirectory(common/data)

include_directories(pages)
add_subdirectory(pages)

message("top GUI_SOURCES = ${GUI_SOURCES}")

add_executable(Gui ${GUI_SOURCES} pages/TreatmentCtrl.cpp pages/TreatmentCtrl.h common/widgets/PushButtonWidget.h)

target_link_libraries(Gui Qt5::Widgets "${LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES}")
set_property(TARGET Gui PROPERTY CXX_STANDARD 14)
